/-!
# Modified Gauss sums

We define the Gauss sum associated to a multiplicative and an additive
character of a finite field and prove some results about them.

## Main definition


Here, let ùîΩ = ùîΩ_q be a finite field with q elements(q = p^f ) and let œá Œ∂_p be a fixed primitive root of unity and let T be the trace from ùîΩ to
‚Ñ§/p‚Ñ§. Define
 œà : ùîΩ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ^√ó , œà(x) = Œ∂_p^T(x)
 and now we define œá as a multiplicative character with these domains.
 ùîΩ^√ó ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ^√ó
We extend œá to all of ùîΩ by setting œá(0) = 0(even if œá is a trivial character).

lemma Œ∂_p_helper_help (n : ‚Ñ§ ): Œ∂_p^((n % (ring_char F)) ) = Œ∂_p^(n) := by
begin
  rw ‚Üê  mul_inv_eq_one,
  rw ‚Üê zpow_neg Œ∂_p n,
  rw ‚Üê zpow_add Œ∂_p,
  rw  is_primitive_root.zpow_eq_one_iff_dvd (fact.out (is_primitive_root Œ∂_p (ring_char F))) ,

lemma Œ∂_p_helper(n : ‚Ñï ): Œ∂_p^((n % (ring_char F)) ) = Œ∂_p^(n) := by

lemma add_char'_mul_property (a : F) (x : F ): add_char' Œ∂_p (a + x) = add_char' Œ∂_p a * add_char' Œ∂_p x := by
begin
  unfold add_char',
  simp,
  haveI : fact (ring_char F).prime := ‚ü®char_p.char_is_prime F _‚ü©,
  rw [zmod.val_add ],
  rw[‚Üê pow_add],
  rw[‚Üê Œ∂_p_helper Œ∂_p ((algebra.trace (zmod (ring_char F)) F a).val + (algebra.trace (zmod (ring_char F)) F x).val)],
  assumption,
  assumption,
end


def conjugate (x : ‚ÑÇÀ£) : ‚ÑÇ := conj (x.val)

lemma Œ∂_p_helper_add (n : ‚Ñ§ )(x : F): conjugate (Œ∂_p^n) = (Œ∂_p^(-n)).val := by
begin
  unfold conjugate,
  simp[conj],
  have h1 : (Œ∂_p)^(ring_char F) = 1 := by
  {
    apply is_primitive_root.pow_eq_one,
    apply fact.out (is_primitive_root Œ∂_p (ring_char F)),
  },
  have h2 : ‚Äñ(Œ∂_p).val‚Äñ  = 1 := by
  {
    have h3 : ring_char F > 0 := by
    {
      haveI : fact (ring_char F).prime := ‚ü®char_p.char_is_prime F _‚ü©,
      exact nat.prime.pos (fact.out (ring_char F).prime),
    },
    set r := (ring_char F).to_pnat' with h4,
    have h5 : ((Œ∂_p).val)^(‚Üër) = 1 := by
    {
      rw  h4,
      simp,
      rw [nat.to_pnat',nat.succ_pnat],
      rw pnat.mk_coe,
      rw nat.succ_pred_eq_of_pos h3,
      rw [‚Üêunits.coe_pow Œ∂_p (ring_char F),‚Üê units.coe_one ,units.eq_iff.mpr h1],
    },
    apply norm_one_of_pow_eq_one h5,
  },
  rw complex.inv_def,
  have h3 : ‚Äñ ((Œ∂_p).val)^n ‚Äñ = 1 := by
  {
    rw [norm_zpow , h2],
    simp,
  },
  simp at h3,
  rw ‚Üê complex.mul_self_abs,
  simp[h3],
end

lemma Œ∂_p_help_add' (n : ‚Ñï  )(x : F): conjugate (Œ∂_p^n) = (Œ∂_p^(- int.of_nat (n) )).val := by
begin
  simpa using Œ∂_p_helper_add Œ∂_p n x,
end



lemma add_char'_conjugate (x : F ):  conjugate ( add_char' Œ∂_p x) = (add_char' Œ∂_p (-x)).val := by
begin
  unfold add_char',
  rw Œ∂_p_help_add' Œ∂_p (algebra.trace (zmod (ring_char F)) F x).val x,
  simp,
  sorry,
end

{ to_fun := by {classical, exact Œª x, conj (œá x) },

   }

begin
